meanings.sent1: The unblessed amulet did not bring any luck.
meanings.sent2: The unblessed grave remained untouched for years.
meanings.sent3: The unblessed potion turned out to be just colored water.
meanings.sent4: Her unblessed ring felt heavy with misfortune.
meanings.sent5: The unblessed land seemed to reject any form of growth.

meanings.sent1: The unblessed ship faced rough seas without guidance.
meanings.sent2: The unblessed village suffered from constant disasters.
meanings.sent3: The unblessed cat always seemed to find trouble.
meanings.sent4: His unblessed armor offered no defense in battle.
meanings.sent5: The unblessed tree stood alone in the storm, vulnerable and exposed.

meanings.sent1: The unblessed child longed for a loving family.
meanings.sent2: The unblessed lottery ticket brought disappointment.
meanings.sent3: The unblessed cake fell flat in the oven.
meanings.sent4: His unblessed career never took off despite hard work.
meanings.sent5: The unblessed day seemed to drag on endlessly.
